## Description {#details}

Thin wrapper around &quot;int&quot; used to store reaching definitions, using an encoding that makes it compatible with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tinyptrvector">TinyPtrVector</a>.

The 0th LSB is forced zero (and will be used for pointer union tagging), The 1st LSB is forced one (to make sure the value is non-zero).

Definition at line 40 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/reachingdefanalysis-h">ReachingDefAnalysis.h</a>.
